response.overview: Taking place in medias res, a desperate man has volunteered to lock himself in an isolated room for over 50 days or so, hoping that he will win a big cash prize to fulfill unknown dreams of his; all because of an unseen wealthy individual. His mental state becomes erratic. He destroys his chances of a better life with his girlfriend, who just wants him to give up and to be with her. Will this prize of capital really fix his problems or will he be worse off than he was before?
response.tagline: The less you are, the less you express your life, the more you have, the greater is your alienated life and the greater is the saving of your alienated being.
response.title: Money Nirvana
